channel.title: Can it be done?
channel.description: I was wondering (I do this a lot) if you could make a server that could hold up to 1k + people (that isn't a 503 client)

item.title: Can it be done?
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

I’m not really sure what the EXACT base of my server is…
its called FranckScape, i think it’s a variation of AllstarScape… but it runs pretty good…

item.title: Can it be done?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

try having like a 2 GHz CPU because I tried doing a server a while back with a 1 GHz CPU and i could only hold like 30 people and there was massive lag. Now i got a 2.5 ghZ CPU and I can hold a lot more!

Read full topic

item.title: Can it be done?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:9, topic:226439"][quote author=Zarfay link=topic=297547.msg2390671#msg2390671 date=1218948583]

Yea you just need to have a good computer also lol

Obviously… With atleast 4 gigs or higher. A server w/ 1k people would prolly crash anything under. =/ <-(just guessing)
[/quote]

Wrong.
A server can run fine with 512mb, although you wouldn’t want to much less.
wL servers are just done so fucking stupidly that they don’t allow for much more then a couple hundred.[/quote]
Really? I never knew that… I thought you had to have a load of memory for a bigger server, or it would just be a crap pile. Thanks for info

Read full topic

item.title: Can it be done?
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“Zarfay, post:5, topic:226439”][quote author=LeechYourStuffPlease link=topic=297547.msg2390664#msg2390664 date=1218948474]
Yea you just need to have a good computer also lol
[/quote]

Obviously… With atleast 4 gigs or higher. A server w/ 1k people would prolly crash anything under. =/ <-(just guessing)[/quote]

Wrong.
A server can run fine with 512mb, although you wouldn’t want to much less.
wL servers are just done so fucking stupidly that they don’t allow for much more then a couple hundred.
